Homepage 



Academics
We create, innovate, challenge and build new knowledge that impacts lives today — as we prepare our students to change tomorrow’s world for the better. With undergraduate education and graduate degree programs across 23 schools and divisions, USC offers a community of scholars that spans the globe and cares for its city: Los Angeles.
